mil3.4.3:0.3: Question on the Five Sense Bases Produced from Kamma
mil3.4.3:1.2: “Venerable Nāgasena, are these five sense bases produced from different kamma or from just one kamma?”
mil3.4.3:1.3: “They are produced from different kamma, your majesty, not from just one kamma.”
mil3.4.3:4.1: Question on the Five Sense Bases Produced from Kamma third
